column5: Stunning Views of the Dallas Skyline! New, Very Clean, 1,900SF, 3 Story Townhouse with a 4th Story Rooftop deck in the best location. Located in Bryan Place, 1 mile from Downtown, 1 mile from Uptown, half mile from Deep Ellum, and 1 mile from Lower Greenville. I am located directly across from a 10 acre park with unobstructed views of downtown on every floor. The rooftop deck is amazing. Perfect place for a real Dallas experience.
